lead.p: substr â€” Extracts a specified number of characters in a string, from a start index.

parameters.parameter: Positive values count from beginning of string, whele negative count from the end.

example.heading: substr example
example.code: console.log('Hello World'.substr(1)); // ello World console.log('Hello World'.substr(-1)); // d console.log('Hello World'.substr(1, 9)); // ello Worl console.log('Hello World'.substr(-4, 3)); // orl console.log('Hello World'.substr(0, 1)); // H
